topic.title: EMS Patient Diastolic Blood Pressure - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-110)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet EMSTEMPVS_015 NEMSIS STATIC (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-111)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-110)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] methodCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet EMSTEMPVS_015 NEMSIS STATIC (CONF-EmergencyRunReport-111)
